review_text:
I actually don't hate Johnny Knoxville, but this was never gonna appeal to me. Cute bear though.

_Final rating:★½: - Boring/disappointing. Avoid where possible._

1. really funny movie about an amusement park with no safety regulations at all. everyone does drugs and gets drunk and has the time of their lives. no real point to the story but its pretty funny and it was just a good time.
